column4: Hey, can anyone help me find a place to grab Windows XP from to use with an existing legitimate XP Home Serial? Sorry to ask off topic here, but this is the only group of intelligent people I can think of
Its on the sticker on the side of my emachine :(
Could I even copy an existing Windows Harddrive to a new harddrive, formatted fat32, and then use my XP repair disk with my serial on it?
if it didn't come with the disk, you can't dl the disk and have it be 'legit'
